Welcome to the E-commerce Application documentation.

This project is a Flask-based e-commerce platform that provides the following services:

  • Customer Management: Register customers, update profiles, and manage wallet balances.

  • Inventory Management: Add, update, and manage inventory.

  • Sales Service: Handle customer purchases.

  • Review Service: Manage product reviews.

Use the navigation to explore the API and code structure.
